name: Simon_(Human)
content:
Simon was a Human male smuggler who lived during the Galactic Civil War.
Simon was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Simon was added to the game along with the smuggling missions introduced with the "Chapter 3" update, released on September 27, 2006.
